hero.title: Enterprise Design Systems
hero.subtitle: Build and scale design systems for enterprise mobile applications with proven Fortune 500 experience.

sections.title: The Enterprise Scale Challenge
sections.content: When you're designing for one app, you control the variables. When you're designing for 50+ teams across multiple business units, the variables control you.

sections.title: Systems That Scale With Organizations
sections.content: Enterprise design systems succeed when they solve people problems, not just design problems. After leading system initiatives at USAA and Progressive, I've learned that adoption comes through value creation, not mandates.

sections.title: Case Study: USAA Mobile Design System
sections.description: USAA needed to coordinate mobile development across 50+ teams while maintaining consistency and accelerating feature delivery for their financial services platform serving 13+ million members.
sections.approach: Led product management for enterprise mobile design system, managing roadmap and backlog through PI planning process. Established shared components, development patterns, and adoption strategies.
sections.innovation: Created advocacy-driven adoption model where early adopter teams became champions, spreading system usage through peer influence rather than top-down mandates.
sections.results: 40% reduction in development time, 80% system adoption, 60% fewer QA issues, 95% team satisfaction
